law.catch_line: Additional documents or information to accompany petition.
law.text:
Along with the petition the court shall be provided with the following documents or information:
A draft of the proposed special needs trust agreement;
If there is litigation pending which involves the special needs person, the petitioner shall submit a brief statement describing the litigation, the expected amount or finally determined amount of the recovery, the existence and amount of any liens or charges applicable to the recovery including any applicable Medicare or Medicaid liens, and the name and address of the payor of the recovery; and
If the special needs person lives in a nursing home or other supervised living arrangement and is receiving, or expected to receive, public assistance benefits, then the petitioner shall inform the court of the nature of the benefits and the amount thereof.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 12, effective July 12, 2012.
